headline: Samsung’s profit blueprint resets Micron stock bets

It doesn't look like a warning shot; it appears more like a plan for how the AI memory boom will translate into substantial profits. headline: Mizuho Hikes Micron (MU) PT to $390 on Strong 2026 AI Memory Outlook
summary: Micron Technology Inc. (NASDAQ:MU) is one of the cheap stocks to buy for the next 3 years. On January 9, Mizuho analyst Vijay Rakesh raised the firm’s price target on Micron to $390 from $290 with an Outperform rating on the shares. In its 2026 semiconductor outlook, Mizuho broadly revised price targets across the sector, […]

headline: AI Chips Today - Kyro Revolutionizes Robotics With Physical AI Breakthrough
summary: At CES 2026, AMC Robotics Corporation unveiled Kyro™, a quadruped robotic platform designed to harness advanced artificial intelligence capabilities, echoing NVIDIA CEO Jensen Huang's proclamation of a "ChatGPT moment for physical AI." This event marks a notable development in the AI Chips industry as Kyro™ integrates cutting-edge AI-driven mobility and perception to address operational challenges in varied environments. With the ability to autonomously navigate and undertake complex tasks,...
